1.18.2.2.0.0:
- Added A Book Of Elements
- Added new achievements
- Added new inventory tabs in creative mode
- Magic boxes have been returned (functionality will be added in the future)
- The identifier of the space stone has been changed to match the localization
- The checkpoint has been replaced with a point with which you can teleport by coordinates
- Sorted some items and blocks
- Balanced effects of stopping and speeding up time
- Improved generation of Dinoera (Past)
- Gorenje magic fireball changed to create fire particles
- The resetmychoice command has been replaced with confstone
- Removed unused commands
- Added the planet command
- Updated the mechanics of placing the structure at the materialization of structures
- Added new structures for the creation wizard
- Removed the fountain structure
- Updated the light master icon
- All textures have been placed in their own categories
- The mod now uses the GPLv3 license
- [Experimental] Added early support for power levels
- [Bugfix] Fixed the streamlining of some blocks
- [Bugfix] Fixed key binding categories
